name: log-search
description: A VSCode extension for searching and filtering log files with support for JSON logs, keyword highlighting, and timestamp filtering.

logSearch.includePatterns.description: File patterns to include in the log search.

logSearch.excludePatterns.description: File patterns to exclude from the log search.

logSearch.logLevels.description: Log levels to include in the search. Use 'ALL' to include all levels.

logSearch.timestampFields.description: The JSON fields to extract timestamps from when processing JSON log entries.

logSearch.customTimestampRegexes.description: Custom regex patterns for extracting timestamps from non-JSON log entries.

logSearch.keywords.description: Keywords to highlight in the log output.
